content: I don't know where this is suppose to go, but I have a wedding gown I would like to donate to a bride in the service or wedding a service man. I also had a connection to a bridal shop, the owner was willing to donate 12 gowns to the military. I tried to contact someone but I didn't get a response, so she has since given the gowns to another charity.\ If anyone is interested in this please post a response.
